description: OVERVIEW: This is a spacious, comfortable flat in Carroll Gardens, the heart of brownstone Brooklyn-- in other words, that cute neighborhood you see in films and TV shows when they want to show the cozy, charming side of NYC life.  I'm on a beautiful tree-lined street where birds will welcome your stay with a song as you sip your morning coffee or tea.  My flat is on the top floor, with lots of natural light. The neighborhood of Carroll Gardens is simply adorable.  It's not surprising to walk down the street and hear Italian being spoken, and then turn the corner and overhear a French conversation. Everybody loves this location; it’s a clean, safe, convenient and reliable place for you to stay on your visit to the city.  There are two trains just 4 blocks away;  the G and the F, and I'm only 15/20 minutes from the city. FLAT DETAILS: -Half of the top floor of a small four-story building  -Peaceful bedroom with a queen-size memory foam bed -Huge, sunny living room with a large sofa (I'm
name: Wonderful Flat - Carroll Gardens

Close to the many local wineries, bike trails, national parks, and hiking trails, this charmingly cozy cottage, nestled beside a beautiful rare Coral Tree on a private three acre ranch, is a uniquely delightful vacation retreat, perfect for personal introspection, romantic renaissance, or family vacation. Surrounded by rolling hills and tree-covered mountains, this house is located about twelve minutes from Pacific Coast Highway in West Malibu while also being about twelve minutes from Westlake Villiage. The cottage interior has beautiful Saltillo floor tiles, rich brocade curtains, two comfortable couches, and a real queen-sized bed ( having traveled myself and experienced the futon options, I note this as a relevant consideration). You’ll love my place because of the beautiful backyard, the friendly neighborhood, the light filled rooms, the comfy beds, and the ambiance. My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, business travelers, and families with kids (one room has a twin and a toddler bed). Backyard with grill! Single-family home, plenty of light. Modern kitchen. Suburban living in NYC. I am always available by phone, email and text. My neighbors are very friendly and welcoming. This is a true NY neighborhood, one of the best! 8 min from 1 train and 15 min from 4 train. Express bus to midtown one block away! Bx1, Bx2, Bx3 and Bx10 all one block away.

description: A cozy and well kept room with beautiful light, plants, a fully equipped new kitchen, a furnished porch & terrace, and only 3 blocks from the L Train subway to Manhattan. Always clean sheets, towels, a 27" iMac (including Netflix, HBO GO, Cable TV), a 50" TV in the living room, a beautiful & green porch, as well as access to the buildings laundry machines. Feel right at home!  The apartment is yours to use :) Nothing to help with, we just want you to enjoy your stay. Within walking distance of the more lively parts of Williamsburg this apartment is in a less trafficked area.  A block from restaurants, convenient stories, bodegas, laundry services, and 3 blocks from the L train. The L Train Subway Graham Ave stop is 3 blocks away, making transportation throughout NYC very easy.  The apartment is also located a 5 minute drive from the BQE. The rooftop has beautiful views of the Manhattan skyline!

description: This beautiful Brownstone duplex has plenty of space for the whole family and groups to  make travel to the city with them a whole lot easier. With a lovely back yard and design-conscious rooms (lots of white, comfortable designer furniture, unique and inspiring art work), along with a large fully family-friendly kitchen, it’s easy to enjoy the up-and-coming neighborhood, travel in and around Manhattan and enjoy this light, bright and friendly space. ACCOMMODATION DETAILS This 4-bedroom duplex is a totally brand new renovated brownstone. It has an open-plan first floor with a large living room, an open kitchen and a bathroom. Stairs lead to the garden from the first  floor. The second floor has the master bedroom with queen size bed, with one large bathroom. and 2 additional mid-size guest room with queen size beds which share a bathroom Modern, warm and welcoming. The living room has an living Divani  couch and a lot of European Furniture, a Turkish carpet from abc, and floss lights.

description: The space is located close to Bistrot Lepic & Wine Bar and other nice restaurants and shops in upper Georgetown.  The space occupies the entire lower level of the house and includes a sleeping area, seating, writing desk and full bathroom.  There are two windows and a door that open to the garden which has a gate that can be used as a separate entrance. The space occupies the entire lower level of the house. description: Conveniently located on a quiet street in a fun neighborhood, this is a bright room in a large 2BR apartment with three separate living spaces (two indoor, one outdoor). This is a classic San Francisco Victorian in a historic neighborhood. Our lovely 2BR/1.25BA apartment has a large kitchen, a separate dining area, two separate living spaces, and a large deck, making it an ideal space to share. We are on a quiet block just a 3min walk to the heart of the Castro (restaurants, bars, shops). The Castro muni station is a 5min walk, connecting you to the rest of the city via public transit. Dolores Park and the Mission (all the best restaurants and nightlife) are a 15min walk. And of course there is Uber and Lyft which can get you anywhere easily and cheaply. The Castro is almost exactly in the center of San Francisco. The apartment is spacious (est. 1200sqft) yet cozy feeling and functional. There is a dishwasher and washer/dryer. You'll be in the guest bedroom, which has a full-sized bed

description: Welcome to my spacious two-room studio in Prospect Heights! This ground-floor apartment has a queen size pillowtop bed, kitchen down the hall from the sleeping/living area & large bathroom with tub and shower. The apartment was renovated in 2014. With a large living/sleeping space and separate kitchen at the other end of the hall, this apartment feels much bigger than a studio. It's on a quiet street just a block away from the express 2/3 train and two blocks from the express 4/5. It's across the street from the Brooklyn Museum and Botanical Garden and a half mile from the Grand Army Plaza entrance to Prospect Park. The apartment is quiet, secure and peaceful. I don't share walls with anyone in the building and I never hear anything from the neighbors upstairs. The other tenants in the building are mostly 30-something professionals who work in NYC. description: This is a beautiful property in Boston's Back Bay neighborhood in downtown. This unit has 3 Bedrooms, 2 Bathrooms, Washer and Dryer, Wifi and Sleeps up to 7. Our latest Boston vacation rental combines the warmth and charm of nineteenth century architecture with twenty-first century amenities. At the crossroads of two historic neighborhoods, you will be a short walk from Back Bay's fashionable shops and the South End's hip restaurants and galleries. This is a true oasis in downtown Boston!  The apartment is nestled in a quiet, low-traffic enclave border the lushly landscape Southwest Corridor Park and Copley Place. description: We love our apartment.  It is spacious for an apartment in lower Manhattan and is in the perfect location to enjoy everything that the city has to offer.  It is lived in by me 90% of the year, which means that the apartment comes fully stocked. - Hard wood floors throughout - Fully equipped kitchen - Free Wifi - Free Cable - 2 double bedrooms on two floors - 1 full bathroom with shower/bathtub - Shared outdoor terrace with basketball hoop - Shared washer/dryer room in building - Air conditioning in both bedrooms The East Village is an amazing neighbourhood, with tonnes of bars, restaurants and things to do.  The apartment is easy walking distance to Gramercy, Lower East Side, Noho, Nolita, Soho, Chinatown and Little Italy amongst others. The area is very well connected by bus and subway and brooklyn is easily accessible via the L train (a short walk) or via the Williamsburg Bridge (4 blocks away).  Most parts of downtown Manhattan are within easy walking distance.

description: Near many excellent restaurants, shopping and transportation, this charming apartment is entered from our front garden through its own entrance. This spacious unit is 1200 square feet, with a large bedroom, living room, eat in kitchen and bath with a tub.  While we are awaiting a cable connection, there is excellent Wifi and you can connect to movies and other entertainment. Cobble Hill is a historic neighborhood and this is a safe, green and friendly residential area. This is a large one bedroom apartment (about 1000 square feet), with a queen Bed in the bedroom, a full bath with tub, a living room and a separate eating area that looks out into our back garden. The kitchen is small but fully equipped, with a full size refrigerator, microwave, gas stove and oven, electric kettle, coffee maker and many cooking utensils. The apartment has is own entrance under the stoop stairs of our brownstone and we live on the other floors. Within walking distance are many subway lines (4/5,2/3, R,N,F
name: Cobble Hill apartment with space and cozy charm
